name: ralph (snarktank)
description: [项目级] Ralph is an autonomous AI agent loop that runs repeatedly until all PRD items are complete. 。来源: https://github.com/snarktank/ralph

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Ralph is an autonomous AI agent loop that runs repeatedly until all PRD items are complete. 

来源: https://github.com/snarktank/ralph
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 10702

name: ralph/flowchart 模块
description: [模块级] ralph 项目的 flowchart 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/snarktank/ralph

genes.title: flowchart 模块说明
genes.content:
[![Ralph Flowchart](ralph-flowchart.png)](https://snarktank.github.io/ralph/)

**[View Interactive Flowchart](https://snarktank.github.io/ralph/)** - Click through to see each step with animations.

The `flowchart/` directory contains the source code. To run locally:

```bash
cd flowchart
npm install
npm run dev
```

genes.content:

npm install
npm run dev

name: ralph/skills 模块
description: [模块级] ralph 项目的 skills 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/snarktank/ralph

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content:
Copy the skills to your Amp or Claude config for use across all projects:

For AMP
```bash
cp -r skills/prd ~/.config/amp/skills/
cp -r skills/ralph ~/.config/amp/skills/
```

For Claude Code (manual)
```bash
cp -r skills/prd ~/.claude/skills/
cp -r skills/ralph ~/.claude/skills/
```
